content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add extract_optional_workspace function to src/support/params.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after params.rs change
Add add_workspace_info_to_response function to src/support/response.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after response.rs change
Add build_workspace_selection_error helper function to src/app_tools/support/scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding error helper
Add find_and_filter_by_workspace generic helper function to src/app_tools/support/scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding filter helper
Add validate_single_result_or_error generic helper function to src/app_tools/support/scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding validation helper
Refactor find_required_app_with_workspace to use new helper functions
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after app function refactor
Refactor find_required_example_with_workspace to use new helper functions
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after example function refactor
Update src/app_tools/brp_launch_bevy_app.rs to use extract_optional_workspace
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_bevy_app workspace extraction change
Update src/app_tools/brp_launch_bevy_app.rs to use add_workspace_info_to_response
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_bevy_app response change
Update src/app_tools/brp_launch_bevy_example.rs to use extract_optional_workspace
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_bevy_example workspace extraction change
Update src/app_tools/brp_launch_bevy_example.rs to use add_workspace_info_to_response
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_bevy_example response change
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features
Fix any clippy issues following the rules (no dead_code, no underscore prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If test issues found, STOP and review with user
Task subagent for code review focusing on duplication and complexity
Review subagent's code review suggestions with user
